q1: Are Brazil a better team than Mexico?
a2: Brazil has a long and impressive history, I agree.
q3: Do you think they can win the next World Cup?
a3: It will be difficult but they have great potential
q4: Who do you think will win the next World Cup if Brazil loses?
a4: I think the heat will play a huge part in who wins next time and Brazil are certainly equipped to deal with that aspect.
q5: Is Pele the best player in the history of Brazil?
a5: It is a matter of opinion between Pele and the original Ronaldo.
